title: Simple Anger Management Tips can HELP you big way! | Zee News
text:
Simple Anger Management Tips can HELP you big way! By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Thursday, February 16, 2017 - 16:21 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Do you suffer from anger issues? Worry not, as we are here to help you out. Today, we will list out some simple tips which can ease out your anger issues. Staying calm and composed is really essential for a healthy mind and body because unless your mind is at peace, you won't feel relaxed. 
In the video below, you can check out the simple tips for anger management. Thank us later! 
Watch video here: First Published: Thursday, February 16, 2017 - 16:21 More from zeenews
